DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Randomized Trial Prostate Biopsy Protocols Comparing Vienna Nomogram Standard 10-core Biopsy Scheme
DOC.detailed_description: Trans rectal ultrasound ( TRUS ) guide prostate biopsy remain standard prostate cancer diagnosis . However , standard protocol miss 15 30 % cancer , lead variable number repeat biopsy . In 2005 Vienna nomogram introduce , define number core obtain prostate biopsy relation age prostate volume patient serum PSA level 2-10 ng/mL . The objective study determine Vienna nomogram increase detection rate trans rectal ultrasound guide prostate biopsy , compare 10-core biopsy . This prospective randomized study enrol men eligible prostate biopsy randomize Vienna nomogram protocol 10-core protocol . They stratify accord age ( ≤65 ; > 65 ≤70 ; > 70 year ) prostate volume ( ≤30 ; > 30 ≤50 ; > 50 ≤70 ; > 70 cc ) . A subgroup analysis patient serum PSA value 2 10 ng/mL perform .
DOC.criteria: PSA elevation Abnormal digital rectal examination Abnormal finding prostate image Active urinary tract infection Documented previous pathological prostatitis History urinary retention Recent low urinary tract surgery
